# based

Author:Vaa

Category: Cryptography

Flag: `HCS{ju5t_b4s3_64_l0l}`

## Description

They didn’t hide the flag… they just buried it alive.

## Solution

1. Extract file chall zip

2. Copy value yang ada di `out.txt`

3. Jalankan perintah ini secara berulang

   ```
   echo "" | base64 -d
   ```

   hasil decode:

   ```
   
   ```

   ```
   echo "" | base64 -d
   ```

   echo "" | base64 -d

   echo "" | base64 -d

   hasil decode:

   echo "" | base64 -d

   echo "" | base64 -d

   ```
   VmxSQ1JrOVdRbGRTYWs1UlZrUkdWMXBJYjNkUFZuQlpXWHBzVVZZd1duVlZSbEY0WVRGV1ZVMUViRlZpUlZVMVZVWmtVMUZzUWxWTlZteHJaV3BCTlZZeFpHcFBWa0pXVGxWS1VWWkVSbkZhU0c5M1QxWlNXVmw2YkZGV2JXZDZWVVpSZUZReGNEWk5SR3hWWVRCVk5WVkdXbTlOTVVKVlRWZHNVbFpFUVRWV1JsWkdUMVpDV0ZOclNsRldSRVowVmxaUmQwOVJQVDA9

   ```
   echo "VmxSQ1JrOVdRbGRTYWs1UlZrUkdWMXBJYjNkUFZuQlpXWHBzVVZZd1duVlZSbEY0WVRGV1ZVMUViRlZpUlZVMVZVWmtVMUZzUWxWTlZteHJaV3BCTlZZeFpHcFBWa0pXVGxWS1VWWkVSbkZhU0c5M1QxWlNXVmw2YkZGV2JXZDZWVVpSZUZReGNEWk5SR3hWWVRCVk5WVkdXbTlOTVVKVlRWZHNVbFpFUVRWV1JsWkdUMVpDV0ZOclNsRldSRVowVmxaUmQwOVJQVDA9" | base64 -d

   hasil decode:
   
   ```
   VlRCRk9WQldSak5RVkRGV1pIb3dPVnBZWXpsUVYwWnVVRlF4YTFWVU1EbFViRVU1VUZkU1FsQlVNVmxrZWpBNVYxZGpPVkJWTlVKUVZERnFaSG93T1ZSWVl6bFFWbWd6VUZReFQxcDZNRGxVYTBVNVVGWm9NMUJVTVdsUlZEQTVWRlZGT1ZCWFNrSlFWREZ0VlZRd09RPT0=

   ```
   echo "VlRCRk9WQldSak5RVkRGV1pIb3dPVnBZWXpsUVYwWnVVRlF4YTFWVU1EbFViRVU1VUZkU1FsQlVNVmxrZWpBNVYxZGpPVkJWTlVKUVZERnFaSG93T1ZSWVl6bFFWbWd6VUZReFQxcDZNRGxVYTBVNVVGWm9NMUJVTVdsUlZEQTVWRlZGT1ZCWFNrSlFWREZ0VlZRd09RPT0=" | base64 -d

   ```
   VTBFOVBWRjNQVDFWZHowOVpYYzlQV0ZuUFQxa1VUMDlUbEU5UFdSQlBUMVlkejA5V1djOVBVNUJQVDFqZHowOVRYYzlQVmgzUFQxT1p6MDlUa0U5UFZoM1BUMWlRVDA5VFVFOVBXSkJQVDFtVVQwOQ==

   ```
   echo "VTBFOVBWRjNQVDFWZHowOVpYYzlQV0ZuUFQxa1VUMDlUbEU5UFdSQlBUMVlkejA5V1djOVBVNUJQVDFqZHowOVRYYzlQVmgzUFQxT1p6MDlUa0U5UFZoM1BUMWlRVDA5VFVFOVBXSkJQVDFtVVQwOQ==" | base64 -d

   hasil decode:
   
   ```
   U0E9PVF3PT1Vdz09ZXc9PWFnPT1kUT09TlE9PWRBPT1Ydz09WWc9PU5BPT1jdz09TXc9PVh3PT1OZz09TkE9PVh3PT1iQT09TUE9PWJBPT1mUT09
   ```

   ```
   echo "U0E9PVF3PT1Vdz09ZXc9PWFnPT1kUT09TlE9PWRBPT1Ydz09WWc9PU5BPT1jdz09TXc9PVh3PT1OZz09TkE9PVh3PT1iQT09TUE9PWJBPT1mUT09" | base64 -d
   ```

   hasil decode:
   
   ```
   SA==Qw==Uw==ew==ag==dQ==NQ==dA==Xw==Yg==NA==cw==Mw==Xw==Ng==NA==Xw==bA==MA==bA==fQ==
   ```

   ```
   echo "SA==" | base64 -d
   echo "Qw==" | base64 -d
   echo "Uw==" | base64 -d
   echo "ew==" | base64 -d
   echo "ag==" | base64 -d
   echo "dQ==" | base64 -d
   echo "NQ==" | base64 -d
   echo "dA==" | base64 -d
   echo "Xw==" | base64 -d
   echo "Yg==" | base64 -d
   echo "NA==" | base64 -d
   echo "cw==" | base64 -d
   echo "Mw==" | base64 -d
   echo "Xw==" | base64 -d
   echo "Ng==" | base64 -d
   echo "NA==" | base64 -d
   echo "Xw==" | base64 -d
   echo "bA==" | base64 -d
   echo "MA==" | base64 -d
   echo "bA==" | base64 -d
   echo "fQ==" | base64 -d
   ```

4. Jalan solver.sh

5. Flag: `HCS{ju5t_b4s3_64_l0l}`
